title: Shhh! It’s quiet over here. Serene 3 bed, 2 bath at Stonecreek on the Green
posting_body: ['Welcome home to Stonecreek on the Green!', 'Located at:', '3974 Annistown Rd', 'Snellville, GA 30039', 'Rental Information:', '# of Bedrooms: 3', '# of Bathrooms:  2', 'Square Footage: 1354 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $2250 - $2600/month', 'Contact our leasing office at', 'show contact info', 'Are you searching for a beautiful apartment in Snellville, GA?', 'Stonecreek on the Green offers everything you need at a great price.', 'With first-class amenities in a beautiful setting, our residents enjoy breathtaking views in a prime location.', 'Take advantage of spacious floor plans, complete with a breakfast bar, roman tubs, a laundry room, and much more.', 'Expect more at Stonecreek on the Green!', 'Community Features:', '− Additional Storage', '− Controlled Access', '− Fitness Center with Free Weights', '− Gazebo', '− Grills', '− Laundry Facilities', '− Playground', '− Resident Business Center', '− Beautiful Park-like Setting', '− Car Care Center', '− Convenient to Shopping, Dining & Entertainment', '− Eat-in Kitchen with Built-In Lazy Susan', '− Great Neighbors', '− Handicap Friendly', '− Resort-Style Pool', 'Unit Features:', '− Cable Ready', '− Carpet', '− Dishwasher', '− Disposal', '− Fireplace in Select Units', '− High Speed Internet Access', '− Kitchen', '− Laundry Rooms', '− Range', '− Window Coverings', '− Balcony in Select Units', '− Breakfast Bar', '− Elegant Fireplaces & Verandas in Select Units', '− Huge Garden Tubs with Ceramic Tile', '− Scenic Views in Select Units', '− Shower/Roman Tubs', '− Smoke Free', '− Sunrooms in Select Units', '− Walk -In Laundry Room with Storage Space', '− Washer/Dryer Hookup', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 5:30 PM', 'show contact info', 'Pet Policy:', 'Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions may apply.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'Leasing Options:', '12-Month, 13-Month', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Management:', 'Peak Living', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'BF897BF249EF48A']
